verses.roman:
śrīvāsa balena,--ye tomāra nāma laya
tāra koṭi aparādha saba haya kṣaya

synonyms: śrīvāsa balena—Śrīvāsa Paṇḍita said; ye—anyone who; tomara—Your; nāma—holy name; laya—takes; tāra—his; koṭi—ten million; aparādha—offenses; saba—all; haya—become; kṣaya—vanquished.
translation: Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura replied, "Anyone who takes Your holy name vanquishes ten million of his offenses immediately.
